project.name: C-C195A-SUBV-02-ST04-DT03-DF12-CF23-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C195A-SUBV-02-ST04-DT03-DF12-CF23-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Allocates a buffer of size 16 to copy taint source into. Checks that the the taint source length is less than 16, but if it is not, returns a -1. The -1 is silently converted to size_t, which is unsigned, resulting in a huge positive number. Then copies that many bytes into the buffer of size 16, causing a seg fault. Good inputs: taint source has length less than 16Bad inputs: taint source has greater than or equal to 16

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 1386 -s 45 -m "Good_Bye_World" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C195A-SUBV-02-ST04-DT03-DF12-CF23-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file Allocates a buffer of size 16 to copy taint source into. Checks that the the taint source length is less than 16, but if it is not, returns a -1. The -1 is silently converted to size_t, which is unsigned, resulting in a huge positive number. Then copies that many bytes into the buffer of size 16, causing a seg fault. Good inputs: taint source has length less than 16Bad inputs: taint source has greater than or equal to 16

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 1386 -s 45 -m "abcd" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"
cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
